comment.body:
Unfortunately it censor's content by changing your post, and limiting your ability to post content. 

Just find the file in your directory. Then replace it with the gif. But use jpg for the ending. Then go back to your Zeronet and resave and reinitialize the picture. Then it will play for you.

Zeronet is a good example of how to create a decentralized, censorship resistant social media platform.

All of the censorship elements can easily be removed. But you will probably need to fork it. And reprogram it deterministically. Which is the way the Bitcoin protocol is programmed and maintained.

My programming days are passed. So some of you young bucks will have to do it..ðŸ¦ŒðŸ™‚
